mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SERVICEAPPLY ( SERVICENO, SERVICESTARTTIME, HELPERPRICE, SERVICESTATUS, SERVICEENDTIME, SERVICEPRICE, SERVICEDATE, SERVICEDEMAND, HELPERNO, PATIENTNO, APPLYDATE, SERVICEAREA, FAMILYNO) VALUES ( service_sq.nextval, #{serviceStartTime }, (to_number(#{serviceEndTime})-to_number(#{serviceStartTime}))*(select codename from code where codeid='P01') * (SELECT CODENAME FROM CODE WHERE CODEID = (SELECT COMMISSIONGRADE FROM HELPER WHERE HELPERNO = #{helperNo})), default, #{serviceEndTime }, (to_number(#{serviceEndTime})-to_number(#{serviceStartTime}))*(select codename from code where codeid='P01'), #{serviceDate}, #{serviceDemand}, #{helperNo}, (SELECT P.PATIENTNO "patientNo" FROM PATIENT P, FAMILY F WHERE P.FAMILYNO = F.FAMILYNO AND F.FAMILYNO = #{familyNo}), sysdate, #{serviceArea}, #{familyNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.SERVICENO "serviceNo", S.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", S.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", S.SERVICESTATUS "serviceStatus", TO_CHAR(S.SERVICEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "serviceDate", S.SERVICEDEMAND "serviceDemand", S.SERVICEAREA "serviceArea", S.SERVICEPRICE "servicePrice", S.FAMILYNO "familyNo", H.HELPERNO "helperNo", H.HELPERTEL "helperTel", H.HELPERNAME "helperName", H.HELPERPROFILE "helperProfile" FROM SERVICEAPPLY S, HELPER H WHERE S.HELPERNO = H.HELPERNO AND SERVICENO IN ( SELECT SERVICENO FROM SERVICEAPPLY WHERE PATIENTNO = ( SELECT P.PATIENTNO "patientNo" FROM FAMILY F, PATIENT P WHERE F.FAMILYNO = P.FAMILYNO AND F.FAMILYNO=#{familyNo})) ORDER BY S.SERVICEDATE

SELECT S.SERVICENO "serviceNo", S.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", S.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", S.SERVICESTATUS "serviceStatus", TO_CHAR(S.SERVICEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "serviceDate", S.SERVICEDEMAND "serviceDemand", S.SERVICEAREA "serviceArea", S.SERVICEPRICE "servicePrice", S.FAMILYNO "familyNo", H.HELPERNO "helperNo", H.HELPERNAME "helperName", H.HELPERPROFILE "helperProfile" FROM SERVICEAPPLY S, HELPER H WHERE S.HELPERNO = H.HELPERNO AND SERVICENO = #{value}
SELECT REALSTARTTIME "realStartTime", REALENDTIME "realEndTime" FROM SERVICEHISTORY WHERE SERVICENO = #{value}

SELECT F.FAMILYNAME "familyName", F.FAMILYNO "familyNo", F.FAMILYADDR "familyAddr", F.FAMILYTEL "familyTel", F.FAMILYEMAIL "familyEmail", S.SERVICEPRICE "servicePrice" FROM FAMILY F, SERVICEAPPLY S WHERE F.FAMILYNO = S.FAMILYNO AND SERVICENO = #{value}
SELECT FAMILYNO "familyNo", HELPERNO "helperNo" FROM BESTLIKE WHERE FAMILYNO = #{familyNo} AND HELPERNO = (SELECT HELPERNO FROM SERVICEAPPLY WHERE FAMILYNO = #{familyNo} AND SERVICENO = #{serviceNo})

SELECT FAMILYNO "familyNo", HELPERNO "helperNo" FROM BLACKLIST WHERE FAMILYNO = #{familyNo} AND HELPERNO = (SELECT HELPERNO FROM SERVICEAPPLY WHERE FAMILYNO = #{familyNo} AND SERVICENO = #{serviceNo})
